facts: Oliver has a life estate in a farm, with Patricia as the remainderman
Oliver allowed the barn to fall into disrepair
Oliver cut down and sold 50 mature oak trees for profit
The property value has decreased by $100,000
asp_facts: property_claim(claim8). claimant(claim8, patricia). respondent(claim8, oliver). claim_type(claim8, waste). property_type(claim8, farm). estate_type(claim8, life_estate). maintenance_neglect(claim8, yes). structure_disrepair(claim8, barn). trees_cut(claim8, 50). trees_sold(claim8, yes). value_decrease(claim8, 100000). waste_type(claim8, both_permissive_and_voluntary).
question: Has Oliver committed waste, and can Patricia seek relief?
rationale: Oliver has committed both permissive waste (neglect of barn) and voluntary waste (cutting timber beyond normal maintenance). Patricia can seek damages and possibly an injunction as remainderman.
